executiveSummary: Founders Jordan Baroque and Daniel Foglesson pitched Three Jerks Jerky, a premium beef jerky made from 100% filet mignon, seeking $100,000 for 15% equity. After multiple offers from the Sharks, the founders accepted a deal with Daymond John for $150,000 in exchange for 33% equity.
keyDecisions: Deal made with Daymond John for $150,000 for 33% equity in Three Jerks Jerky.
nextSteps: Daymond John will begin working with the Three Jerks Jerky team to scale operations and grow the business into a national jerky brand.
